SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT069
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message shows the time at which the Daily Check Report for the GPA or FIN application is generated for the requesting destination. It is the response to an MT 049 Daily Check Report Time Query.
From: GPA or FIN To: User

SystemField.Name: hour
SystemField.description: Hour, local to the receiver, when the Daily Check Report is generated. Hour is in the range 00-23.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: hour
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Range: 00-23
Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFTNetwork is in GMT.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Hour '" + $value + "'. hour should be in the format HH and in between 00 to 23."
